definition: The term refers to the person who holds authority and ownership over a household or property. It is commonly used to describe the male head of a household or the owner of a house or estate.

examples.german: Der Hausherrn hat das letzte Wort.
examples.english: The landlord has the final say.

examples.german: Der Hausherrn hat das Recht, Gäste abzulehnen.
examples.english: The landlord has the right to refuse guests.

examples.german: Der Hausherrn kümmert sich um die Instandhaltung des Gebäudes.
examples.english: The landlord takes care of the maintenance of the building.
The landlord lives on the ground floor.

examples.german: Der Hausherrn vermietet die Wohnung möbliert.
examples.english: The landlord rents out the apartment furnished.
